input_args.passage: 'Old-earth or young-earth belief | CMI takes the stand that the creation is thousands of years old, based on straightforward acceptance of the chronology in Genesis.'
input_args.claim: 'From the second source, it is clear that Creation Ministries International (CMI) holds a similar view as Answers in Genesis, as it also believes that the creation is thousands of years old, which aligns with the young Earth view.'
